Sentencas: We elaborated a new ceramic paste formulation as a pre-step to ram extrusion process for obtaining porous and mechanically sustainable microtubular anodes.
Titulo: Ascendable method for the fabrication of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells by ram-extrusion technique

Sentencas: The methodology reported here can establish a scalable fabrication pathway for anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells (MT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Ascendable method for the fabrication of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells by ram-extrusion technique

Sentencas: We succeeded in the fabrication of NiO-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta (NiO-CGO) based MT-anodes from a ceramic paste which comprised of alpha-cellulose and ethyl cellulose as pore former and binder, respectively.
Titulo: Ascendable method for the fabrication of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells by ram-extrusion technique

Sentencas: The quantity of the pore former was optimized and 15 wt % of pore former was elected as the superior, based on the microstructure and mechanical behavior.
Titulo: Ascendable method for the fabrication of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells by ram-extrusion technique

Sentencas: The sintered (at 1450 degrees C) microtubular (MT-anodes) exhibited an excellent mechanical strength of similar to 60 MPa as flexural strength (modulus of rupture) with 0.23% of deformation resistance.
Titulo: Ascendable method for the fabrication of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells by ram-extrusion technique

Sentencas: The obtained MT-anodes were used as a support for the fabrication of MT-SOFCs prototype with configuration such as Ni-CGO/CGO/LSFC-CGO for anode/electrolyte/cathode, respectively.
Titulo: Ascendable method for the fabrication of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells by ram-extrusion technique

Sentencas: The ceramic nanocomposites NiO-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta (Ni-CGO), and La0.6Sr0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3-Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta (LSFC-CGO) were synthetized by one-step solution combustion method and characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electronic microscopy (SEM) analysis.
Titulo: Ascendable method for the fabrication of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells by ram-extrusion technique

Sentencas: The fabricated MT-SOFC prototype generated a maximum power density of 0.595 W/cm(2) at 600 degrees C signified the worth of the proposed paste formulation.
Titulo: Ascendable method for the fabrication of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells by ram-extrusion technique
